basic_info.title: Mexico Government Scholarship 2024 (Fully Funded)
basic_info.author: Muhammad Saim Rasheed
basic_info.funded_by: Mexican Agency for International Development Cooperation (AMEXCID)

program_details.description: On behalf of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, the Mexican Agency for International Development Cooperation (AMEXCID) invited Foreign citizens to apply for the **Fully Funded Mexico Government Scholarship 2024**. The call is open to citizens of more than **180** countries. The scholarship is awarded for full-time **Undergraduate**, **Master**, **PhD**, **Postgraduate** Research, and **Post** **Doctoral** programs. In this scholarship, more than 90 Mexican higher education institutes are participating.

required_documents: Scholarship application form, duly completed and signed.
A letter detailing the reasons that motivate you to carry out the studies or research in Mexico. (Maximum 2 pages, with letter Arial size 12 and single line spacing).
Curriculum vitae. (Maximum 3 pages, with Arial font size 12 and single line spacing).
Letter of academic acceptance from the Mexican institution recipient or response of the HEI to the application for admission (see Requirements section of the acceptance letter).
Letter of commitment to return to the country of origin.
Letter of acceptance of the terms of the Call.
Copy of the valid passport in color and open book format or government-issued photo ID.

Copy of the medical certificate issued by a public institution or private health, with a maximum of 3 (three) months before the presentation of the application, indicating that the Applicant is in good health.

In those cases in which Spanish is not the applicant’s mother tongue, must submit a copy of proof of advanced knowledge of the **Spanish language** issued by any university or educational center for its accreditation, which guarantees a minimum level of B2, within the Common Framework European Reference.
Letter in which the applicant states under protest to say truth, that the information provided is true.
All documents and forms must be in Spanish or submitted with translations into Spanish.
application_process: You have to fill out the application in Spanish.
Apply Online at Academic Cooperation Management System (SIGCA): https://sigca.sre.gob.mx/
